clara.rules
Class RuleLoader

java.lang.Object
  clara.rules.RuleLoader

public class RuleLoader
extends java.lang.Object

Clara rule loader. Produces a WorkingMemory given one or more Clojure namespaces containing rules.

static WorkingMemory loadRules(java.lang.String... namespaces)
          Returns a new working memory with rules loaded from the given namespaces.

loadRules

public static WorkingMemory loadRules(java.lang.String... namespaces)
Returns a new working memory with rules loaded from the given namespaces.

Parameters:
namespaces - namespaces from which to load rules
Returns:
an empty working memory with rules from the given namespaces.
